what_we_resolved: 2026-01-06 - Paper ingestion pipeline architecture → Decided: GROBID full processing with OCRmyPDF preprocessing for scanned materials, citation extraction deferred to Phase 2
2026-01-07 - Output interface: Notion vs faster alternatives? → Decided: Obsidian for fast generation, excellent search, and graph view
2026-01-08 - Database vs JSON/Markdown for MVP - what are the tradeoffs? → Decided: Use Obsidian frontmatter + simple JSON processing state, no SQLite for MVP
2026-01-08 - SQLite vs Obsidian-native metadata (YAML frontmatter + Dataview) - which for MVP? → Decided: Obsidian frontmatter for metadata, processing_state.json for deduplication tracking

2026-01-08 - MVP input priority: arXiv+DOI first, then PDFs+web content? Or include web content in MVP? → Decided: Include web content in MVP: arXiv + DOI + web articles + clean PDFs. Defer scanned/annotated PDFs to v0.2
2026-01-08 - When to implement paper acquisition/retrieval stack (*arr-style)? → Decided: Implement in v0.1.5 after MVP - use for quality upgrades of poor scans
